COMMENT: Source Link is for a rather expensive version of a machined straight male pin header with 40-pins which can be broken into smaller pieces to server for both. There are cheaper ones| but the link is used for future reference.
Examples are 23128| 23256| 2764| 27128| 27256| 27512| 2864| 28256 and all other variations such as 27C256 or AT28C64B
Optional. Could be used for right-angle jumpers or attaching ribbon cable to move switch towards more accessible place.
Optional. Adding the ability to switch character sets.
